about_the_game:
Heroes of Forever is a fast-paced, action-packed VR shooter that blends the best elements of light gun games and classic sci-fi cinema for a new era of cover-shooting mayhem. Take a leap through dimensions with a motley cast of 4 ragtag recruits and stop nefarious forces from altering history forever… by blasting enemies as fast as possible!

LEAP INTO ACTION

Embark on a multiverse-spanning adventure as an elite TEC agent, with 4 playable characters to choose from. Dispatch dimensional conflicts on missions across a variety of vibrant levels, packed with thrilling discoveries and a witty film-inspired narrative.

ACROSS DIMENSIONS, ACROSS PLATFORMS: NO AGENT LEFT BEHIND

Explore a selection of retro arcade game modes including (but not limited to) Score Attack, Time Attack, and Story Mode. Your choice: combat the chaos alone, or join forces with friends in 4-player co-op – now with cross-platform support!

WARP IN. WIELD YOUR WEAPON. WIPE 'EM OUT.

Discover a diverse arsenal of weapons across space and time, from classic crossbows to lightning-fast laser pistols. Maximise your high score by refining your technique; defeating enemies in quick succession will grant you a gratifying chain of bonus points.

MASTER THE ART OF TAKING COVER

Dive into dynamic environments filled with physics-based props. Dodge, duck, and weave through the chaos to evade enemy fire with VR mobility. Collapse structures to crush crowds of enemies and create your own cover with the wreckage. Resourcefulness will be rewarded!

FRENETIC FACE-OFFS

Blast through swathes of formidable foes in adrenaline-fuelled combat! Each enemy you encounter will possess distinct characteristics to test your skills. Learn their patterns, exploit their weaknesses, and anticipate their unique behaviours to guarantee mission success.

KEY FEATURES

  • Online co-op multiplayer (2 - 4 players)
  • Singleplayer mode – offline or online (leaderboards)
  • Multiple arcade-inspired game modes, including Time Attack, Score Attack, and Story Mode
  • 4 playable characters to choose from, each with unique backstories to uncover
  • Leap through a variety of vibrant levels across space and time
  • Discover a diverse arsenal of weapons to master
  • Maximise your high score with chain shots and on-site explosives
  • Dodge, duck, and manipulate physics-based objects for tactical advantages
  • Formidable boss battles and endless enemies with unique combat patterns
  • Enjoy thrilling VR arcade action tailored to you, with a range of accessibility settings

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: SteamVR
